title: Portable ATSC 3 TV Tuner - Watch OTA TV on your smartphone - GT Media HDTV Mate
description:
Buy one on Amazon: https://lon.tv/4h5on (compensated affiliate link) - GT Media's HDTV Mate TV tuner plugs into any Android device and can tune into ATSC 3 and ATSC 1 signals. It's compatible with Android TV along with smartphones and tablets. See more ATSC 3 - https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=iEjBrItgXuU&list=PLCZHp4d1HnIsuCQeXMcowwERYtTqrWfH7 and subscribe! http://lon.tv/s
